author: WizdomTrooth
text:
Good question. If a person lives long enough at a place, a simple internet search will show the town one lives in. So it is good to be aware and have a plan to call police for trespassing, keep doors/windows locked, in case the narcissist decides to do a pop-in. Or move frequently. Not sure how celebrities keep their addresses private. It would be good to know.

This all is not said to diminish the need to celebrate OPs Freedom!!!
Congrats to OP!!! <3 Nicely done!!!
